aboutpara: Hello! My name is Daud Manuwo, and I am a 2nd year Computer Science student passionate about bridging the gap between theoretical knowledge and real-world application. My academic journey has sparked a deep interest in software engineering and application development, areas where I aim to make meaningful contributions.
